titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3717) to prohibit the expenditure of Federal funds for the distribution of needles or syringes for the hypodermic injection of illegal drugs.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-497, by Mr. Solomon.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3717 with 2 hours of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Providing for the consideration of the bill in the House. Measure will be read by section. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 169.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/28/1998--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 3717 (prohibition on Federal funding for needle exchange programs).
